name: The Good Book VN
description:
The Good Book VN is a Visual Novel using text and picture's and theme music
It contain's over 15 page's of rich story text Crime and Punishment Fiction set in uk England in the 1980's

A story about young teenager that chose the wrong path in life.
May contain Themes of adult nature may contain swear words or references to: Crime and Punishment , Gangs and Violance, Drug's Guns Crime and Prison Time ,
Health Life Style Advice, Finding jesus Christ and spotting the devil that tells lie's and his plan for you
1980's
England uk
Rich story text
Visual Novel

Don't choose the gun or the knife ,choose your life - Thank you for supporting my work's

Press Next then Go to Navigate the page's of the Visual Novel or Main to return to beginning
Game is to run on Wndows 64 platform only
